thread.title: George Clooney buying Tuscany vacation home: Report
thread.title_full: George Clooney buying Tuscany vacation home: Report

title: George Clooney buying Tuscany vacation home: Report
text:
Celeb Travel 
Hollywood actor George Clooney has made an offer on a holiday home in the Tuscany region of Italy, according to a U.K. report. 
The 'Ocean's Eleven' star already owns properties in Los Angeles, Mexico, and near Lake Como in Italy, and is planning to move into his new marital home in England with wife Amal later this year once renovations are complete. 
However, George has his eye on a clifftop villa in the seaside town of Castiglione della Pescaia, an area recommended to the actor by his chef pal Federico Salza, and he has reportedly made a bid on the house. 
Photo Galleries
